description: A component for displaying tabbed content.

props.name: tabs
props.description: The list of tabs to display.

props.name: value
props.description: The key of the selected tab.

props.name: underline
props.description: Display a border underlining all tabs. When tabs are in an element with a border-bottom it is preferable to omit the tabs border-bottom

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when the selected tab is changed.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Add tabs here (NeonTab). NOTE: Tabs can also be added outside of the component if required
